title: Napoleon Bonaparte: Rise to Power
itunes:title: Napoleon Bonaparte: Rise to Power
itunes:subtitle: In this archive episode, Dan talks to Adam Zamoyski, a historian who has written a biography of Napoleon, about the early life and rise to power of one of the most remarkable men in history.
description:
In this archive episode, Dan talks to Adam Zamoyski, a historian who has written a biography of Napoleon, about the early life and rise to power of one of the most remarkable men in history.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
